mapper.insert: insert into monster_die (id, zonename, mobname, killer, dietime, mapname, relivetime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zonename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{killer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dietime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mapname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relivetime,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update monster_die set zonename = #{zonename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobname = #{mobname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, killer = #{killer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dietime = #{dietime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mapname = #{mapname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, relivetime = #{relivetime,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.zonename from monster_die a right join(select min(id) id from monster_die GROUP BY zonename) b on b.id = a.id WHERE a.id is not null
select id, zonename, mobname, killer, dietime, mapname, relivetime from monster_die
